ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-Band Unlocked GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900.
Slim & Trendy QWERTY Design; Live Square; 3.5mm Headphone Jack; Threaded SMS Format and MP3 Player.
2MP Camera with Auto Focus; Digital Zoom and Flash/LED; Card slot microSD up to 16GB; Bluetooth and Built in games.
Up to 5 hours of talk time, up to 444 hours of standby time.
2MP Camera with Auto Focus; Digital Zoom and Flash/LED; 2.4-inch TFT LCD display; Card slot microSD up to 16GB; Bluetooth and Built in games.
ProductInfo.Name: LG GW300 Unlocked Quad-Band Cell Phone with 2 MP Camera, Bluetooth, FM Radio and Micro SD slot --International Version with Warranty (Blue)
